# Virtual French and English Language Group Training

## Request for Proposal

### Reference Number: cb-9154-51318208

The Fisheries and Oceans Canada, Canadian Coast Guard, is seeking a contractor to provide virtual group language training in French and English. The objective of this instructional approach is to improve the overall proficiency of learners in their second language.

### Scope of Work

The successful contractor will be responsible for providing a comprehensive language training program for an MCTS orientation course targeting recruitment. The program will consist of two (2) one-hour sessions, scheduled twice a week, on non-consecutive days, and will accommodate up to eight (8) learners in each group.

### Key Requirements

* The contractor must have a thorough command of the official languages in which the course is taught.
* Teaching resources must be able to start and end sessions at the specified time and provide a sufficient amount of time to connect before the sessions begin.
* The contractor will focus on providing a flexible learning approach that adapts to learners' different schedules.
* Language training will occur during business hours (Monday to Friday, 10:00-12:00 and 13:00-16:00) and will not run concurrently with other training groups.

### Contract Details

* Period of Contract: From the date of award to September 30, 2024, with three (3) option periods of one (1) year each.
* Security Requirement: None
* Comprehensive Land Claims Agreement: None
